attributes.action: change TESSA JOWELLS mind about Undershaw
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Secretary of State should give Conan Doyle the recognition he deserves Tessa Jowell’s decision not to upgrade Sir Arthur Conan Doyle’s Surrey home, Undershaw, to be a Grade I-listed building on the grounds that the writer does not occupy a significant enough position in the nation’s consciousness,
